DOC.criteria: Chronic plantar fasciitis ( duration disorder least 4 month ) At least 4 point visual analogue scale ( 010 ) severe pain within last 48 hour At least 2 previous unsuccessful conservative therapy Age 18 old Rheumatoid disease ( M. Bechterew , chronic polyarthritis , psoriasisarthritis , para /postinfectious arthritis etc . ) Previous surgery affect area foot Pretreatment Botulinum toxin A ( de novo patient ) Prohibited concomitant treatment : local injection study 2 week prior start study
